text: Tomb Raider is a 2018 action-adventure movie. It was directed by Roar Uthaug. It is based on the 2013 video game Tomb Raider. It stars Alicia Vikander as Lara Croft. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2018 action movies Category:2018 adventure movies Category:2010s 3D movies Category:American action movies Category:American adventure movies Category:British action movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Coming-of-age movies Category:Movies set in 2018 Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in Hong Kong Category:Movies set in Japan Category:Movies based on video games Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Tomb Raider (movie)
